QuestData.Title: What Tomorrow Brings
QuestData.Description: <The F.C.D. buzzes.>$B$BLook around the Cathedral Quarter. There should be a telescope nearby that the 7th Legion uses for spying. Find it and use it to scout the harbor. We need to find out how the 7th Legion got past our fleet.$B$BHurry, $n. We can't hold these beasts back much longer.$B$BWhat does tomorrow bring?
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Search the area for the 7th Legion telescope.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the 7th Legion Telescope to Scout the Harbor.
QuestData.RewardText: <The F.C.D. crackles with electricity.>$B$BTORPEDOED! We had everything at the water line covered, but nothing below the line. They must have snuck in beneath our defenses and then blown our warships to smithereens.$B$BAnd now the rest of the Alliance fleet is nearly here...

Objectives.Objective: Use the 7th Legion Telescope to Scout the Harbor.
